extendedInfo.description: Rise through the ranks against 21 of the PBAâs best bowlers as you compete for a variety of regional and national championship trophies. Starting in a local alley with a scuffed up 12lb ball, youâll hone your skills against bowling legends on your way to competing in the Tournament of Champions! Features Include:â¢	Multiplayer, Quickplay, and Career modes!â¢	Dozens of PBA Tournaments!â¢	Bowl against 21 of the best PBA bowlers!â¢	Over 30 different bowling balls with unique stats!â¢	Leaderboards and Achievementsâ¢	Bonus challenges in every tournament!â¢	Level up to 199 in Career Mode!â¢	Split Balls, Bomb Balls, and more!Online Multiplayer Action!Bowl against your friends in real-time, one-on-one Multiplayer matches! Powered by Google Play game services, multiplayer mode lets you invite your Google+ friends or get matched against a random opponent!Start a career or bowl a quick game!Career mode is at the heart of PBA Bowling Challenge, but if youâd rather just lace up and take to the lanes, weâve got you covered. Choose from a wide variety of opponents and locations and unlock even more content in Career Mode! Bowl against the best!How do you think youâd fare against the cool confidence and pin-point accuracy of Walter Ray Williams, Jr. or the brash power stroke of Pete Weber? How would your scores stand up against the high spin and smooth release of Mike Fagan or the high cranking backswing of Tommy Jones? Based on actual statistics that track their power, hook, and control, PBA Bowling Challenge strives to accurately recreate the skill and style of the top bowlers in the sport today.Leaderboards & Achievements!Unlock dozens of achievements and climb to the top of a variety of individual tournament and multiplayer leaderboards.Upgrade your game!Whether you like to power straight through to the nine pin or hook wide and skid-snap to the middle, with over 30 different balls available, youâre sure to find one that suits your style. A variety of stats, including, power, hook and control, give each ball a unique feel on the lane and an assortment of colors and textures make sure youâll look good while you roll. Split Ball, Bomb Ball, and more!They may not be tournament legal in the real world, but these special balls can really help you out in a tough tournament.If the lane seems too big and your ball seems too small, the Lightning Ballâs swirling storm of electricity is sure to hit something! Want to clear a 7-10 split without breaking a sweat? Try the Split ball! It splits into two balls when you tap it! And when you absolutely, positively have to knock down every pin on the lane, the bomb ball is what you need. Just hit a single pin, any pin, for an explosive strike.Best Bowling on mobile!From the reflection of the ball as it travels the lustrous sheen of a well-oiled 3D lane to the thunder of the pins as they explode in a strike, this is bowling like it was meant to be experienced on mobile. This is PBA Bowling Challenge from Concrete Software.

reviews.title: Great fun gamr
reviews.comment: Easy to play lots of fun! A great goto no matter what time of day.
reviews.author: Matt Paul

reviews.title: Bowling at it\'s best!!!
reviews.comment: This is the best bowling game I\'ve played on a mobile phone!!!! Awesome ball selections and tournaments are full of fun and off the chain!!!!!
reviews.author: Darryl Bennett

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This game is so much fun and it is so easy. The graphics are awesome! install and play today, one of my favorite games!!!!
reviews.author: Cammie Butler

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: Great game. Easy to pick up and play. Great variety of special bowling balls. Lot of fun!
reviews.author: Lee Walker

reviews.title: Super fun!
reviews.comment: Finally a game.where you don\'t have to break the piggy bank to advance! Amazing graphics, customer service and great technical support. Congratulations on a well designed game! 5*\'s all the way!
reviews.author: Omar Gonzalez

reviews.title: Cool Phone Bowling
reviews.comment: Better than most I\'ve played on a phone. Cool power ups
reviews.author: Mike Foley

reviews.title: Amazing Graphics
reviews.comment: This game is so much fun. The graphics are so beautiful and detailed. Each new bowling alley is unique. Play this game every day!
reviews.author: Matt Rody

reviews.title: Very Entertaining
reviews.comment: I enjoy a good game that is well designed and this game gets it

reviews.comment: Awsome game love eitherplaying career mode or compete against friends it fun and competitive at the same time only wish u could play with more friends at a time then it would b a perfect bowling game

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This game is awesome, great graphics realistic oil patterns and fun too
reviews.author: Eric Ouderkirk

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: Best bowling game around,  really smooth, great graphics,  love it.
reviews.author: Geniene Williams

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Love this game. Progression is steady with no need to spend extra to progress. Controls and graphics are excellent as is the gameplay. Would have gladly paid a couple quid for this. In my top 10 droid games for sure.
reviews.author: craig brown

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Fun, realistic, addictive. Love this app!!
reviews.author: Howie Gillman

reviews.title: Bowling excellence!!
reviews.comment: Love this game. Amazing clarity, details, graphics and highly addictive gameplay.
reviews.author: Matzah One

reviews.title: Excellent fun app
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on my next book 8\" tablet. Awesome keep up the great work!!
reviews.author: Jon-Paul Parent

reviews.title: PBA Bowling App
reviews.comment: Awesome app, it looks just like your really there! The bowling alley looks shiny and so real, and the pins are just big enough, with perfect sound, that adds to the ambience. I didnt want to stop playing!  If you\'re looking for a bowling app, this is the one! Great job inventors!
reviews.author: Juliette Fladger

reviews.comment: If it has PBA in the title it better be good and it is. The best free game all time...\tDon\'t waste your time with other bowling games. This is the best bowling game on the market. Good job PBA.
reviews.author: Keith Sprague

reviews.title: Never got my gold pins
reviews.comment: Got 50k gold pins, never got them, submited request and after 5 weeks no reply. Cannot resubmit. Rip off! Update 8 weeks later, 300 pins....
reviews.author: Chris Holt

reviews.comment: This game is very addictive, I can\'t get enough.Once u figure out how to control the ball and use the right one u will be hooked too.this game is awesome download it and find out for your self........
reviews.author: Chad Hobbs

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: Enjoy playing this app., the best part is my grandsons have had such a fun ti me playing it with their Grandpa they now want to go and learn how to play it for real. Thank You....
